title: Mads Pedersen Abandons Tour de France, Leaves Pothole in Lidl-Trek’s Plans
content:
Team loses stage-hunting ace to injuries sustained in sprint crash in another blow after Geoghegan Hart's DNS: 'We will work out a Plan B to race aggressively.'

Read the full article at Mads Pedersen Abandons Tour de France, Leaves Pothole in Lidl-Trek’s Plans on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
